content: {"name": "Met Council - COJO Bensonhurst", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Serving zip codes; 11214, 11204, 11209, 11223.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.bencojo.org/programs.htm", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "8635 21st Avenue", "address_2": "Suite 1B", "city": "Bath Beach", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11214", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.602336, "longitude": -73.99663869999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 333-1834", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Zip code restrictions"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "May be closed during Jewish holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Kosher food available"}]}
